resources.string: CREATE TABLE mobile_event (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, day TEXT NOT NULL, startDate TEXT NOT NULL, endDate TEXT NOT NULL, startTime TEXT NOT NULL, endTime TEXT NOT NULL, name TEXT NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, location TEXT NOT NULL, hasDescription INTEGER NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE mobile_result (INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, competition_type_id INTEGER, competition_type_name TEXT, competition_id INTEGER, competition_name TEXT, competition_type INTEGER, competition_result TEXT);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TableCount FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = \'table\' AND name = ?s;
CREATE TABLE db_version (db_version INTEGER NOT NULL);
